alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 06 at 3:48AM CDT until July 06 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 450 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 5 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN OKLAHOMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN THE OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE BEAVER IN TEXAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 16 COUNTIES IN THE TEXAS PANHANDLE ARMSTRONG CARSON DALLAM DEAF SMITH HANSFORD HARTLEY HEMPHILL HUTCHINSON LIPSCOMB MOORE OCHILTREE OLDHAM POTTER RANDALL ROBERTS SHERMAN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMARILLO, BEAVER, BOOKER, BOOTLEG, BORGER, BOYS RANCH, BUFFALO LAKE, BUSHLAND, CANADIAN, CANYON, CHANNING, CLAUDE, CODMAN, CONLEN, DALHART, DAWN, DUMAS, FARNSWORTH, FOLLETT, FORGAN, FOUR WAY, GLAZIER, GOODNIGHT, GRUVER, HARTLEY, HEREFORD, HIGGINS, LAKE MARVIN, LORA, MASTERSON, MIAMI, PANHANDLE, PANTEX, PERRYTON, ROMERO, SKELLYTOWN, SPEARMAN, STRATFORD, UMBARGER, VEGA, WAKA, WARE, WASHBURN, WAYSIDE, WHITE DEER, WILDORADO, AND WOLF CREEK PARK.
